bibl.title: Thmuis, A 'New Land' in the Eastern Nile Delta. First Canadian Mission at Thmuis.
bibl.publisher: Scripta Antiqua [The virtual library of the Canadian Institute in Egypt]
bibl.note: The first Canadian Mission at Thmuis (Mission Canadienne de Thmouis = MCT) took place from May 14 to June 9, 2013. - I. The 'Khoronfich' [northeastern part of Tell Timai]. - II. Architectural study. - III. Ceramological material. - IV. Survey [hellenistic to late Roman remains].
bibl.seg: Katherine Blouin, Thomas Faucher, Nicholas Hudson, Mohamed Kenawi, A. Kirby, Rachel Mairs, Giorgia Marchiori & Matthieu Van Peene, Thmuis, A 'New Land' in the Eastern Nile Delta. First Canadian Mission at Thmuis.
Cairo, Scripta Antiqua [The virtual library of the Canadian Institute in Egypt], 2013, 4Â°, 10 pp., 8 figg. n./bl. et coul. ISBN 978-0-9811785-5-4.

The first Canadian Mission at Thmuis (Mission Canadienne de Thmouis = MCT) took place from May 14 to June 9, 2013. - I. The 'Khoronfich' [northeastern part of Tell Timai]. - II. Architectural study. - III. Ceramological material. - IV. Survey [hellenistic to late Roman remains].
Blouin Faucher Hudson Kenawi Kirby Mairs Marchiori Van Peene
